6 namespace Ubiquity\assets;
7 
8 use Ubiquity\themes\ThemesManager;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
10 
21 class AssetsManager {
22  const ASSETS_FOLDER = '/public/assets/';
23  private static $siteURL;
24 
25  private static function gString($template, $variable, $attributes = []) {
26  $implode = UArray::implodeAsso ( $attributes, ' ' );
27  return sprintf ( $template, $variable, $implode );
28  }
29 
30  private static function script($src, $attributes = []) {
31  return self::gString ( '<script type="text/javascript" src="%s" %s></script>', $src, $attributes );
32  }
33 
34  private static function stylesheet($link, $attributes = []) {
35  return self::gString ( '<link href="%s" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" %s>', $link, $attributes );
36  }
37 
44  public static function start(&$config) {
45  $siteURL = $config ['siteUrl'] ?? '';
46  self::$siteURL = rtrim ( $siteURL, '/' );
47  }
48 
56  public static function getUrl($resource, $absolute = false) {
57  if (strpos ( $resource, '//' ) !== false) {
58  return $resource;
59  }
60  if ($absolute) {
61  return self::$siteURL . self::ASSETS_FOLDER . $resource;
62  }
63  return ltrim ( self::ASSETS_FOLDER, '/' ) . $resource;
64  }
65 
73  public static function getActiveThemeUrl($resource, $absolute = false) {
74  $activeTheme = ThemesManager::getActiveTheme ();
75  return self::getThemeUrl ( $activeTheme, $resource, $absolute );
76  }
77 
86  public static function getThemeUrl($theme, $resource, $absolute = false) {
87  if ($absolute) {
88  return self::$siteURL . self::ASSETS_FOLDER . $theme . '/' . $resource;
89  }
90  return ltrim ( self::ASSETS_FOLDER, '/' ) . $theme . '/' . $resource;
91  }
92 
101  public static function js($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
102  return self::script ( self::getUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
103  }
104 
113  public static function css($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
114  return self::stylesheet ( self::getUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
115  }
116 
125  public static function js_($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
126  return self::script ( self::getActiveThemeUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
127  }
128 
137  public static function css_($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
138  return self::stylesheet ( self::getActiveThemeUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
139  }
140 }
